verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm חֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> of mercy וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> and judgment אָשִׁ֑ירָה <WH7891> I will sing לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto thee O LORD אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <WH2167> will I sing

אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה ׀ <WH7919> I will behave myself wisely בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ <WH1870> way תָּמִ֗ים <WH8549> in a perfect מָ֭תַי <WH4970> When תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> O when wilt thou come אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> unto me? I will walk בְּתָם־ <WH8537> with a perfect לְ֝בָבִ֗י <WH3824> heart בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> within בֵּיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> my house

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אָשִׁ֨ית ׀ <WH7896> I will set לְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינַ֗י <WH5869> before mine eyes דְּֽבַר־ <WH1697> thing בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל <WH1100> no wicked עֲשֹֽׂה־ <WH6213> the work סֵטִ֥ים <WH7750> of them that turn aside שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <WH8130> I hate לֹ֖א <WH3808> no יִדְבַּ֣ק <WH1692> [it] shall not cleave בִּֽי׃
לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> heart עִ֭קֵּשׁ <WH6141> A froward יָס֣וּר <WH5493> shall depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> a wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> no אֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> from me I will not know

[מְלֹושְׁנִי כ] (מְלָשְׁנִ֬י <WH3960> accuse ק) בַסֵּ֨תֶר ׀ <WH5643> Whoso privily רֵעֵהוּ֮ <WH7453> his neighbour אוֹת֪וֹ <WH853> אַ֫צְמִ֥ית <WH6789> him will I cut off גְּֽבַהּ־ <WH1362> him that hath an high עֵ֭ינַיִם <WH5869> look וּרְחַ֣ב <WH7342> and a proud לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> heart אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> No אוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> will not I suffer

עֵינַ֤י ׀ <WH5869> Mine eyes בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־ <WH539> [shall be] upon the faithful אֶרֶץ֮ <WH776> of the land לָשֶׁ֪בֶת <WH3427> that they may dwell עִמָּ֫דִ֥י <WH5978> who הֹ֭לֵךְ <WH1980> with me he that walketh בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way תָּמִ֑ים <WH8549> in a perfect ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> is the one יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃ <WH8334> he shall serve

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יֵשֵׁ֨ב ׀ <WH3427> shall not dwell בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> within בֵּיתִי֮ <WH1004> my house עֹשֵׂ֪ה <WH6213> He that worketh רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה <WH7423> deceit דֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> he that telleth שְׁקָרִ֑ים <WH8267> lies לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִ֝כּ֗וֹן <WH3559> shall not tarry לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> in my sight

לַבְּקָרִ֗ים <WH1242> I will early אַצְמִ֥ית <WH6789> destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> all רִשְׁעֵי־ <WH7563> all the wicked אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land לְהַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> that I may cut off מֵֽעִיר־ <WH5892> from the city יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> doers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> all wicked
